description: This is a hike in a conservation area to an amazing view point overlooking the Niagara Escarpment.  The hike is quite easy with a bit of elevation gain or loss close to the escarpment.   Lots of small and medium crevasses to explore near the escarpment and signs of rock climbing everywhere.
directions: Highway 401 to Guelph Line rd.  Drive south to Mt. Nemo Conservation Area at 43.416556, -79.882592
title: Mt Nemo Conservation Area
